data.title: Cincinnati Metro Area Live Audio Feeds

data.text:
Listen Feed Genre Listeners Player Selection Links Status Boone County Fire and EMS Dispatch

feed location is Walton Fire Protection District Station 1. NKY Public Safety P25 system Boone County Only Public Safety

2 Online Boone County Police and Fire

Broadcasting Boone County Police and Fire Dispatch. Including Florence, Burlington, Hebron, Petersburg, Walton, Union, Verona, and several other agencies operating on Boone County's frequenies. Public Safety

2 Online Campbell County Fire & EMS Public Safety

1 Online Cincinnati Area NOAA Weather Radio Other

3 Online Cincinnati Area Skywarn (WARN) WB8CRS 146.8800 MHz

Weather Amateur Radio Network (WARN) - The WARN weather net covers 17 counties in southwest Ohio, northern Kentucky, and southeast Indiana. The W8NWS net control point is located in WLW radio's newsroom. Amateur Radio

0 Online Cincinnati Fire

City of Cincinnati Fire Department, on Ohio MARCS - IP CFD Zone A EMS and Fire Zones B-J. Ohio MARCS-IP: Multi-Agency Radio Communications (P25) Project 25 Phase I, APCO-25 Common Air Interface Exclusive; (Feed provided by Radio Shack Pro 197 Dig Public Safety

5 Online Cincinnati Police

Cincinnati Police Talkgroups for District 1-4 Central Business District dispatches as part of District 1 operations. Public Safety

65 Online Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (KCVG) Aviation

1 Online Clermont County and Union Township Fire

Clermont County Fire Dispatch 13Fire1 & 13FDALERT1 Union Township, Clermont County Fire Dispatch 13UTFD4D & Fire Ground13UTFDFire2 (Feed provided by GRE PSR 600 located in Owensville, OH) Public Safety

5 Online Clermont County Public Safety Public Safety

26 Online Dayton Area NOAA Weather Radio WXJ46 Other

4 Online Hamilton County Amateur Repeaters

ARES Activities In Hamilton County OHKYIN, QCEN, W8ESS, KC8EGV repeaters Amateur Radio

0 Online Hamilton County Police, Fire and EMS Dispatch

Police, Fire & EMS Dispatch, plus firegrounds for the suburbs of Cincinnati. Public Safety

42 Online Hamilton County Sheriff - East

Status: Main computer crashed. Power source issue. Running on back ups. Public Safety

3 Online Kenton County Police and Fire

Kenton County Police and Fire Dispatch. Cities of Covington, Independence, Piner, Ludlow, Erlanger, Elsmere, Edgewood, Crescent Springs, Villa Hills, Ft Mitchell, Ft.Wright and other agencies communicating on Kenton County. Public Safety

4 Online Loveland-Symmes Fire Public Safety

0 Online Middletown Fire Main Public Safety

1 Online Middletown Police and Fire Public Safety

6 Online Northern Kentucky Public Safety

Broadcasting Boone, Kenton, & Campbell Counties Emergency Communications. Listen to POLICE Dispatch for BOONE & KENTON County. (Campbell County is encrypted). FIRE/EMS Dispatch for BOONE, KENTON, & CAMPBELL County. AIRCARE, OHIO RIVER & NKY WATER RESCUE Public Safety

0 Online OH-KY-IN 146.67 Amateur Radio Repeater Amateur Radio

This feed is for the 83 PD Primary 2 and 83 TAC 2 talkgroups Public Safety
